full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Notice Details

- **Notice Reference:** WS4429672935
- **Amendment Number:** 1
- **Solicitation Number:** WS4429672935
- **Publication Date:** 2024-02-23
- **Closing Date:** 2024-03-21 14:00:00
- **Status:** Expired

### Service Notice

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is inviting suppliers to submit a Request for Proposal (RFP) for HVAC maintenance services. The services will be provided at 255 Albert St. and the Statement of Work outlines the requirements.

### Key Tender Details

* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** IRFA, CFTA, CCFTA, CKFTA, CCA, CPFA
* **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contact Information

For any queries or concerns, please contact:

* Douglas, Lisel
* E-mail: [lisel.douglas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisel.douglas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice URL

The RFP can be accessed through [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18890483?extsite=MTg4OTA0ODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

### Security Requirements

This requirement has security requirements that must be met.

### Mandatory Site Visit

A site visit is mandatory for all respondents. The site visit will be held on March 6, 2024 at 10:00am EST. Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority no later than February 28, 2024 at 14:00 EST to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend. 

### RELIABILITY Clearance is Required
 RELIABILITY Clearance is mandatory for the selected contractor.

Note:
We got rid of some sections in the original data, as it was not relevant to the main announcement. It seems like most of it was redundant. In this rewritten version, we also changed the paragraph for the tender description into bullet points, following official standards and included more relevant
